author: Special Correspondent
text:
Passengers and railway officials rescued a young girl who attempted to run away from home in Tirunelveli by Chennai-bound Kanyakumari Express on Thursday. Sources said that when the Travelling Ticket Examiner found the girl, without valid ticket in the air-conditioned coach, weeping, a woman passenger came forward to talk to her and found out that she was running away from home. The passenger came forward to bear the travel expenses for the girl to take her back home. However, when the issue came to the notice of senior officials in Madurai, the girl was allowed to travel up to Madurai where she was taken care of by a woman Railway Protection Force constable.

The family members have been informed to take the girl back home, the source said.
title: Girl rescued
